quotes.quote: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.
The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
Show up, show up, show up, and after a while the muse shows up, too.
Aim for the company of immortals.
If you believe something needs to exist, if it's something you want to use yourself, don't let anyone ever stop you from doing it.
Take your victories, whatever they may be, cherish them, use them, but don't settle for just them.
The greater the difficulty, the more the glory in surmounting it.
The reason why I am success today is because I had one friend who believed in me and I didn't have the heart to let him down
Every strike brings me closer to the next win
Magic is just spending more time on something than anyone else might reasonably expect.
There's really no limit to what you can do.
